body_html:
I think it would be useful to add hooks to the output of str(model).
I use str(model) in my logging system and currently I can't know whether my models used weight normalizations or not since it's a hook.

body:
I think it would be useful to add hooks to the output of str(model).
I use str(model) in my logging system and currently I can't know whether my models used weight normalizations or not since it's a hook.
